name: Pong Remix (Bloomzeye, robakh)
description:
Play pong-like mini-games with a twist in this fun arcade game made for the GMTK 2022 Jam! Each level is something random, so stay on your toes!

How to play

  • Press SPACEBAR to start the ball movement whenever it's in the center.
  • Player 1: Move the left pong paddle using W (up) and S (down)  keys.
  • Player 2: Move the right pong paddle using the UP and DOWN arrow keys.

Dev Team: Art/Design: Bloomzeye | Programming: Ro

Assets Used:

Sound FX: Kronbits  https://kronbits.itch.io/freesfx

Music: Fred Patry  https://fredpatry-music-composer.itch.io/

Fonts: Kenny https://kenney.nl/assets/kenney-fonts
